A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: wrong on so many levels of story telling. Disney has created yet another Star Wars film with no main character\, no character archs\, and changed the fundamental character of Luke Skywalker. They also killed the storylines they alluded to in The Force Awakens. By trying to be so unpredictable\, they have failed to give us a good Star Wars story. They have flash over substance but Carrie fisher and Mark Hamill still shine in this film inspite of the flaws. They are the only saving grace and neither of them can return to the next film.
